pages.name: page1

elements.name: drill_hammer
elements.title: A drill and a hammer cost $330 in total. The drill costs $300 more than the hammer. How much does the hammer cost?

elements.name: rachel
elements.title: Rachel is the 10th tallest and the 10th shortest girl in her class. How many girls are in her class?

elements.name: toaster
elements.title: When on sale for 20% off, a toaster costs $100. What does it cost when not on sale?

elements.name: apples
elements.title: In a pail of 60 apples, red apples are 3 times more common than green ones. How many are green?

elements.name: eggs
elements.title: After hatching from its egg, a baby bird doubles in weight every day. By day 12 it weighs a pound. On what day does the bird weigh half a pound?

elements.name: dog_cat
elements.title: A dog and a cat weigh 100 pounds in total. The dog weighs 86 pounds. What is the difference in weight between the dog and the cat?

pages.description: Please only write the numeric answer to the following questions
